column4: So I'm trying to chmod a device file in order to give raw access to it. specifically I want to let a non-root user run VirtualBox, using a .vmdk file that links to a real physical partition.
The problem is, whenever I chmod the device file /dev/sda1, my changes are always reverted a few minutes later
i assume this is some sort of anti-rootkit behaviour. can it be suppressed?
